ClassDef.Name: Lighting

Properties.Name: Skybox
Properties.Description: Sets the skybox to one of the preset skyboxes.

Properties.Name: AmbientSource
Properties.Description: Determines the source of ambient lighting in the place.

Properties.Name: AmbientColor
Properties.Description: Sets the ambient color of the lighting in the place.

Properties.Name: FogEnabled
Properties.Description: Enables or disables fog in the place.

Properties.Name: FogColor
Properties.Description: Sets the color of the fog in the place.

Properties.Name: FogStartDistance
Properties.Description: Sets the distance from the camera at which fog begins to appear.

Properties.Name: FogEndDistance
Properties.Description: Sets the distance from the camera at which fog stops appearing.

ClassDef.Description: Lighting is responsible for controlling the state of the lighting in the place. It provides many different options for creators to enhance and fine-tune the visuals of their worlds.
